oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Swiss American Sketchbook, Auguste Burnand 015
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Auguste Burnand
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Swiss American Sketchbook, Auguste Burnand 015. The log roling in Tennessee 1856. (Entassement & combustion des debris dun defrichment(?).) Log rolling in Tennessee, 1856. Piling up and burning the debris... From the Swiss American Sketchbook with drawings by French-Swiss traveling artist Auguste Burnand (ca. 1835-ca. 1860?). He lived in the Swiss American community near Knoxville, TN, from 1853-1860.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Axes; Drawings; Loggers; Fires; Horses; Trees;
